website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a drone for a child who is new to the technology, this one won't break your budget if it ends up being a casualty of the learning experience.
pros: This drone's gyroscope makes it easy to keep it stable during flight, so youngsters can try their hand at new tricks and stunts
Very affordable, so it's ideal for first-time flyers who are bound to crash while getting the hang of it
cons: Battery life is fairly short, yet charging it takes as long as 50 minutes
Doesn't perform well when it's windy

customer_reviews.title: Great first for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson for Christmas. I put it together to try it and it's great. He is going to love it. It's going to be easy for him to us. It's going to be fun to watch him see what pictures he gets on the camera. It was easy to put together. I like that you have a battery to charge and not have to buy any. Lol. It was priced great for a first one for my grandson to learn from. I will be getting a couple more for my other two grandsons. There younger but they will have one too. It's a great first drone.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell kneece

customer_reviews.title: Nephew's 2nd Drone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew on Black Friday for around $20. The camera is actually pretty good compared to nearly every other toy-grade camera drone. Comes with (4GB) SD card and USB reader which is a major plus. We took it out on a breezy day (about 5mph consistent winds) and it handled great. I took a star off because there is no camera dampening, meaning the videos come out very "wobbly" for lack of a better word. What I did to fix this was insert a foam wedge between the spherical camera and the drone body. This fixed it pretty good. Overall, a great toy drone for the younger crowd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazin' Customer

customer_reviews.title: Giving up after two. Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: First item didn't work out of the box, even after reading all directions and reviewing an instructionals video. The SECOND one flew great for a day. On the second day while flying it came down in grass, short grass, and wouldn't fly again. This was not a crash. It seemed fine. Had landed on it's landing gear. Just wouldn't fly again. Every time you tried to fly it, it would just fall over onto it's side. Like the two propellers on that side weren't working but they were all spinning just fine. Giving up and returning. Not a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break
customer_reviews.text: This is worst, and not good enough that I have to worry it will break anytime soon. It is hard to start and it wont hold balance or hard to takes off. I was worried that it only had few minutes of flying time but it’s so overwhelming that I don’t really want to have more than that. It broke the first time landing because the control could not connect it right. It run into stuff and fly’s around like a giant buzzing fly with flashing lights. My kids love it, so It would be nice to have better quality control.
customer_reviews.author: 2th*

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Terrible, Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Son & husband was extremely disappointed on Christmas Day. After 2 days of trying, they gave up. No instructions. 1 Of the LEDs didn’t work. Never made it off the ground. Flipped over immediately. I returned the unit and ordered a different unit from a different brand. Very Happy with 2nd unit
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D

customer_reviews.title: This item has been used.
customer_reviews.text: I open the box and it wasn't new parts are missing and I can't charge it up because it doesn't have a charger or battery.
customer_reviews.author: Janarold

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this drone as a Christmas present for one of my nephews, and it didn’t work at all, they tried everything but the thing didn’t work, he was so sad 😞and I’m very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: C. LaRosa

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrived one of the propeller guards was missing, I called Amazon and they fixed me right up by sending a 4 pack. Our grandson loves it and has put it on their roof a couple times but he is getting better at steering it.
customer_reviews.author: redf250@hotmail.com

customer_reviews.title: Only the second one I've ever flown and its easy to learn.
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I had was that it's very fast even on the lowest speed setting but it's very fun to fly after you get used to the controls. Stay low and only fly in the daylight until you get used to the controls.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for our daughter for Christmas and one of the propellers wasn't working. We contacted Amazon and they had us contacted the company and they wanted to charge us. Still sitting in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Andy W

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cheap parts. Broke in the first hour. Unable to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Chaos

customer_reviews.title: A joke... I think
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it'd he fun if it worked. Battery was already installed, meaning it was used, instructions are hard to follow, there isnt even an micro sd port where it says there is, kinda think this thing is a prank just to see how much time you'll waste lol
customer_reviews.author: John Blecha

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Christmas gift and he has already played with it for hours since opening it. Highly recommended for any age
customer_reviews.author: Ron Norris

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew opened this on Christmas Eve and it did not make it to the next morning. I was very disappointed with everything about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my young brother and he loves it every thing works perfect it fly's for about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this as gift for my grandson birthday. It’s made of cheap material and operating was difficult
customer_reviews.author: Tiger den

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from works tech toys
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from this company several times and everything I’ve ever bought was a junk. It’s from world tech toys
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Voce

customer_reviews.title: Great but beware there’s a learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Great little drone. Works really well too. Just make sure you have plenty of room until you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Was a gift for my son he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after less than one minute of its first use.
customer_reviews.author: Tsadi

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two of these for grandkids. One came without ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these for grandkids. One came without battery and the second one did not work. A disappointing Christmas for kids!
customer_reviews.author: LARRY

customer_reviews.title: Ensure all instructions are in box prior to shipment
customer_reviews.text: Item did not come with any instructions or a slot for the SD card to install
customer_reviews.author: K. Ancrum

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, great price
customer_reviews.text: This will be an awesome Christmas present for my son. Very affordable and looks durable
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Need to do better than this with product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Same crap. New models not working from the company for mi. No more
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Gill

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice toy. I donated it to our AWANA store at church.
customer_reviews.author: Derek R Parsons

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Drone. It's fast. Take your time and learn it. It can get like trying to watch a fly. Make sure the wind is calm as possible. At ground level it doesn't seem bad, but about 20' up the wind can get ya off course. I lost this in a tree and took several hours getting it back. But again, I'm a newbie in the Drone field. I do find the Pictures and Vids are grainy. In video mode, the camera shakes so bad during flight, it's really not usable. There's no way of fixing this problem though. It's a cheap Drone, but it's a good place to start I guess in the world of Droning.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Short flights only
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas gift. while it does fly, it only fly's for 2 min and the battery is dead. It came with two batteries and both last only 2 min. Flight time aside, No amount of "Trim" adjustments makes the thing hover in even zero wind. By the time you get it trimmed to fly, the battery is dead.
customer_reviews.author: R. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Sorry but it doesnt work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift and was tickled to get it as I am an experienced RC fixed wing pilot as well as a private pilot of real full scale aircraft. I had a great deal of difficulty flying this thing. It seemed to work OK initially but after a few rough landings I find that it wants to fly backwards from the beginning and no amount of trim will help it. When I press autopilot to start the rotors working it immediately noses up and falls back on the rear of the skids. After trying everything up to and adding weights on the front I was unsuccessful in getting it to flying.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Stay Clear
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this thing one bit. I flew it once successfully and after that it was all down hill. One bad landing in the grass and it will not take off anymore. It attempts a one sided lift but just flips over; will not take off. Very disappointed with this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Mel X

customer_reviews.title: No FPV screen function
customer_reviews.text: Set it all up and charged batteries. It flies ok but the LCD screen will not sync with the camera. No picture.
customer_reviews.author: G-Major

customer_reviews.title: Fly FAR away from this one!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one from the same manufacturer that is extremely similar to this just under a different name (Orion SPY Camera drone). Do searches on the shopping networks and you will find a video demonstration. Watch the first few minutes and my rating will be self explanatory. The trim features barely work and even on the most windless day this drone will NOT hover. You constantly have to manipulate the controls. Perhaps someone with more experience could make this work but for a beginner/novice it's more frustration than flying.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary user

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy-
customer_reviews.text: Camera screen did not work and company would not replace. Real piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Warning Do NOT BY THIS . IT IS A BIG PIECE OF JUNK! SO DISSATISFIED WITH THE WHOLE THING. JUNK JUNK JUNK if i could give a zero i would
customer_reviews.author: Joelle M.

customer_reviews.title: World Tech Elite Mini Orion
customer_reviews.text: Elite mini orion is pretty easy to fly and control. The altitude hold makes it easy the one con about it is the battery it comes with is no good and it's hard to find batteries for this. Other then that it's fun and easy to fly. I'm not even a pro pilot just a novice.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This drone has amazing stabilization. It hovers well and takes quality photos. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

product_meta.title: World Tech Toys Elite Mini Orion Spy Drone 2.4GHz 4.5CH Picture/Video Camera RC Quadcopter, White, 12 x 7.75 x 4.25
feature_bullets: 2.4GHz transmitter; 1280 x 720 30 fps video; still photo; LED lights; built-in gyro; multi-dimensional flight capability; Lightweight durable body
Easy start; flight modes easy mode; return assist; easy lock altitude; ready to fly
Includes: drone; 2.4GHz transmitter; 4 protective covers; 4 Replacement blades; 3.7V 600Mah Lithium battery; USB charger cable; 4 GB micro SD; micro SD card reader USB drive
Battery requirements: transmitter: 4 AA batteries (not included); charger: USB charger cable (included); vehicle: 3.7V 600Mah Lithium battery (included)
